name: AudioBalanceFade
desc: Describes audio left/right balance and front/back fade values.

items.name: init(mLeftRightBalance: Float32, mBackFrontFade: Float32, mType: AudioBalanceFadeType, mChannelLayout: UnsafePointer<AudioChannelLayout>)
var mBackFrontFade: Float32
items.desc: The audio front/back fade, where -1 represents full rear, 0 represents center, and +1 represents full front.

items.name: var mChannelLayout: UnsafePointer<AudioChannelLayout>
items.desc: The size, in bytes, of the mMagicCookie parameter.

items.name: var mLeftRightBalance: Float32
items.desc: The audio left/right balance, where -1 represents full left, 0 represents center, and +1 represents full right.

items.name: var mType: AudioBalanceFadeType
items.desc: An AudioBalanceFadeType constant. max unity gain, or equal power.
